gen:link.msg:message: De datum gerapporteerd voor `DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheCalendarYearStartDate` MOET liggen voor de datum gerapporteerd voor `DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheCalendarYearEndDate`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsWithoutEmployment12MonthsSpecification_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheCalendarYearStartDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsWithoutEmployment12MonthsSpecification_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheCalendarYearStartDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsWithoutEmployment12MonthsSpecification_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheCalendarYearEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationExecutiveSeniorOfficialsWithoutEmployment12MonthsSpecification_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_DurationOfTheEmploymentDuringTheCalendarYearEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
